articles.title: KSC Supports S. Korean Youth's Just Struggle
articles.content:
KSC Supports S. Korean Youth's Just Struggle
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Korean Student Committee (KSC) in a statement issued on Saturday extended support to the south Korean youth and students and people of all other social strata in their just struggle for social democracy against the puppet regime's unpopular fascist suppression and misrule.
					 South Korea has turned into tundra and graveyard of democracy in the 21st century where elementary human rights, democracy, freedom of thinking and political activities are mercilessly trampled down, the statement noted, and went on: 
					
					 The remnants of the "yusin" dictatorship which met miserable ends after being severely punished by the nation more than 30 years ago and their descendants are riding roughshod as if the days of their glory had returned. They cooked up the "law on dismantling enemy-benefiting organization," not content with the ill-famed "Security Law," creating an extremely horrible atmosphere throughout society. 
					
					 The present conservative ruling quarters are trying to divert elsewhere public attention and eliminate at once all progressive and democratic forces which stand in the way of enforcing an unpopular rule and seeking long-term office, taken aback by the full disclosure of their despicable true colors as grabbers of power through all sorts of election riggings. 
					
					 It is as clear as pikestaff that if the ill-famed "yusin" dictatorship is allowed to revive in south Korea, it will be impossible for the youth and students to expect any sweet dream or hope for future. 
					
					 Looking back on history, the youth and students of south Korea have always played a pioneer's role in the struggle for social justice and truth. 
					
					 All the youth and students in the DPRK will always stand by those of south Korea in their actions against the conservative group's moves for "yusin" dictatorship and repressive campaign against the progressive and democratic forces, with the belief that they will surely emerge victorious in their struggle for the democratization of society.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports Leaves for China
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Physical Culture and Sports headed by Vice-Minister Son Kwang Ho left here on Saturday to visit China.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) headed by Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, returned home Saturday after visiting Mexico and attending the 13th Congress of the Brazilian Communist Party held in Sao Paulo, Brazil.

articles.title: Chinese Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Ambassador Gives Reception
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Chinese Ambassador to the DPRK Liu Hongcai hosted a reception on Saturday to mark the diamond jubilee of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the governments of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the People's Republic of China. 
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of Foreign Trade, Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, and officials concerned. 
					
					 Staff members of the Chinese embassy and Chinese guests staying here were present at the reception.

articles.title: Special Exhibition Prize Awarded to Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia
articles.content:
Special Exhibition Prize Awarded to Kimilsungia, Kimjongilia
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Immortal flowers Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia were awarded the special exhibition prize at the 9th China (Beijing) International Garden Expo.
					The expo held on the subject of "A City of Woodland, A Beautiful Garden" between May 18 and November 18 brought together dozens of countries including the DPRK and many units from various parts of China. It drew more than 6.1 million visitors.
					
					 An awarding ceremony was held in the meeting room of the exhibition centre of the organizing committee of the expo on Nov. 19.
					
					 A diploma of the special exhibition prize awarded to the flowers was conveyed to the delegation of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.

articles.title: Pyongyang Art Troupe's Performance Proves Successful in China
articles.content:
Pyongyang Art Troupe's Performance Proves Successful in China
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Art Troupe is taking part in the 13th Asia Art Festival in China. It gave its separate performance. 
					 The performance was enjoyed by personages of the people's governments and other people of Yunnan Province and Kunming City, members of the festival organizing committee and foreigners participating in the festival. 
					
					 Audience lavished praises on its presentation, mesmerized by it. 
					
					 The vice secretary general of the Yunnan Provincial People's Government said that all the numbers presented by the Pyongyang Art Troupe were fascinating. 
					
					 The director of the Cultural Department of Yunnan Province said that the performance was very splendid as it was a good combination of songs, instrumental music and dances, adding it fully showcased the vitality and attraction of Korean arts. 
					
					 CCTV, Yunnan TV, Kunming TV, Yunnan Daily and other broadcasting services, TVs, papers and internet websites vied with each other to give wide publicity to the performance of the Pyongyang Art Troupe.

articles.title: Successes Made in Autumn Land Management
articles.content:
Successes Made in Autumn Land Management
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- People from across the country are achieving successes in the autumn general mobilization drive for land management. 
					 Projects for construction and technical improvement of roads have progressed much earlier than scheduled. 
					
					 Officials and other people in Songgan County, Jagang Province have wound up the improvement of roads extending tens of km in a short span of time. 
					
					 Kosan County, Kangwon Province face-lifted roads extending more than 10 kilometers in a matter of a week. 
					
					 Kumchon County, North Hwanghae Province widened roads by using at least 50 000 cubic meters of earth. 
					
					 The project for ensuring road security and convenience in traffic made brisk headway in Chonma County, North Phyongan Province. It built two bridges. Hamju, Hongwon and Pukchong counties, South Hamgyong Province finished the repair of bridges. 
					
					 People in different parts of the country are increasing the production of saplings, while reinforcing foundations of sapling producers. 
					
					 Songwon County, Jagang Province produced more than 11 million saplings in the wake of laying a foundation for putting the production of humus-pot saplings on a normal footing. 
					
					 Hochon County, South Hamgyong Province built a new mother nursery of saplings covering more than ten hectares while face-lifting nurseries by covering them with at least 14 000 cubic meters of fertile soil. 
					
					 Hoeryong City and Musan County, North Hamgyong Province are cultivating a lot of saplings of good species after putting the production of saplings on a scientific, industrial and intensive basis. 
					
					 River improvement projects are also going full steam ahead. 
					
					 Officials and other people of Kanggye and Huichon cities and Jasong and Jonchon counties, Jagang Province have pushed ahead with the dike projects after setting river improvement as an important work for land administration. 
					
					 Ryongsong District and Kangdong and Kangnam counties in Pyongyang finished river embankment projects during the drive.

articles.title: Fumigation Therapy Proves Successful in DPRK
articles.content:
Fumigation Therapy Proves Successful in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The acupuncture and moxibustion department of South Phyongan Provincial Hospital of Koryo Medicine has made successes in curing diseases with fumigation therapy.
					 Fumigation is one of the traditional therapies. It is effective in treating diseases with steam or smoke generated when boiling or burning medicinal herbs.
					
					 The fumigation therapy is made up of three treatment methods -- directly steaming the body, washing or fomenting focus with decoction after steaming and fumigating part of the body.
					
					 The therapy can be applied with acupuncture and moxibustion. It is characterized by fast and clear effectiveness in treatment, no side effect, easy application, etc.
					
					 Particularly, it has been proved that the therapy is very efficacious for synovitis.
					
					 A research group of the hospital has deepened the study of fumigation, thus developing various kinds of instruments for the therapy.
					
					 The fumigation therapy is applied to many kinds of diseases like hypertension, neurological disorder, paralyses, insomnia, gynaecopathy and skin diseases.
					
					 The therapy has been introduced in many hospitals in the province to prove effective in treatment of diseases.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Are Outstanding Strategists: Newspaper
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Are Outstanding Strategists: Newspaper
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are peerless strategists and invincible and iron-willed commanders who worked military miracles immortal in the nation's history spanning 5 000 years and in the history of the human cause of independence with their outstanding military idea, strategy, matchless pluck and rare commanding art.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The last century was called century of wars because the confrontation between revolution and counter-revolution and between independent forces and hegemonic forces was fierce in all parts of the world.
					
					 This history records not a few famous generals and great men who performed exploits on behalf of the country, nation and humankind by leading revolutionary wars to victory with their outstanding war methods.
					
					 However, it does not know such outstanding strategists and iron-willed commanders as Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, who worked military miracles by defeating two imperialist formidable enemies in one generation and glorified the 20th century as a century of victory in the cause of independence against imperialism, the cause of socialism by smashing all imperialists' moves for aggression during the whole century.
					
					 Throughout the long history their Songun idea and leadership served as a life-line of the country, revolution, army and people of the DPRK and their brilliant wisdom and outstanding strategy and tactics were the fundamental source of victory in the struggle against imperialism and the U.S.
					
					 They were men of matchless pluck and grit as they always beat back enemies with the tactics of offensive in the confrontation with imperialism and weathered with their own initiative the difficulties before them full of faith in victory and optimism, turning misfortune into fortune.
					
					 The immortal exploits they performed by leading the struggle against imperialism and the U.S. to victory serve as an eternal bedrock for making the DPRK shed eternal rays as a power of Songun, concludes  the article.

articles.title: Papers Call for Boosting Friendly, Cooperative Relations with China
articles.content:
Papers Call for Boosting Friendly, Cooperative Relations with China
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- It is the invariable will of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to boost the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations, say the DPRK's leading newspapers Saturday.
					 President Kim Il Sung signed the DPRK-China agreement on economic and cultural cooperation with Premier Zhou Enlai.
					
					 The conclusion of the agreement confirmed the overall framework and orientation for developing the cooperation in the economic and cultural sectors between the two countries and marked a historic occasion in putting strong spurs to the development of the bilateral traditional relations of friendship and cooperation, says Rodong Sinmun in an article.
					
					 To boost the economic and cultural cooperation and friendly relations between the two countries provides an important guarantee for successfully pushing forward the revolution and construction in the two countries, defusing the daily escalating tension on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia and preserving global peace and security, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 It is the invariable will of our party and people to bring into full bloom the traditional DPRK-China friendship generation after generation.
					
					 Our party and people will make positive efforts to boost the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations in the future, too, as desired by Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations provided and developed by the leaders of the elder generation of the DPRK and China will grow stronger day by day as required by the new era and common desire of the two peoples under the deep care of the top leaders of the two parties and the two countries.
					
					 Minju Joson in an article notes that the Korean people will as ever conduct brisk economic and cultural exchange and cooperation in the common interests of the two peoples.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Vociferating about "Adhering to Principle"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Vociferating about "Adhering to Principle"
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The "theory of adhering to principle" touted by the south Korean puppet regime is a criminal theory for a nuclear war against the north and a vicious theory of confrontation between compatriots as it is pushing the north-south relations to the point of explosion. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The principle touted by the puppet group means "building confidence between the south and the north on the basis of reliable deterrence". The "reliable deterrence" is nothing but the "alliance" with the U.S. 
					
					 Their principle to govern the inter-Korean relations means building confidence with fellow countrymen, backed by outside forces. This is nothing but ridiculous remarks provoking a side-splitting laughter. 
					
					 Outsiders want neither to see peace settled on the Korean Peninsula nor to get the inter-Korean relations repaired. It is the sinister intention of outsiders to escalate the confrontation between Koreans and create regional instability in a bid to fish in troubled waters. 
					
					 This being a hard reality, the south Korean puppet authorities are calling for mending the north-south relations on the basis of the "alliance" with the U.S. This is nothing but a revelation of the criminal attempt to stand in confrontation with the north to the last backed by outside forces. 
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that they are working hard to realize their dangerous scenario for a nuclear war against the north in collusion with the U.S., trumpeting about the "principle of disallowing the north's nukes" and "joint action to cope with nuclear threat". 
					
					 All facts clearly prove that their "theory of adhering to principle" is the worst theory of confrontation and war designed to escalate the confrontation between fellow countrymen and disturb peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks Flailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Unification Minister's Anti-DPRK Remarks Flailed
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Ryu Kil Jae, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, told a recent special lecture that "even the word 'unification' should not be used if necessary", crying out for "formulating a conception of unification suited to the era". 
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 What Ryu uttered is nothing but a jargon for confrontation of the guy who does not know what is shame on the nation.
					
					 The reunification desired by the Korean nation is not a reunification presupposing one side swallowing up the other. The country will become one only when foreign domination and interference in its affairs are terminated, the sovereignty of the nation is established and the north and the south achieve national unity as a homogenous nation.
					
					 This truth is clear to every Korean. It is, therefore, a tragedy that Ryu Kil Jae does not know about it though he styles himself "an expert on north Korean affairs".
					
					 Traitor Ryu jabbered one should not regard the tragedy of national division as "something disgraceful." This was cunning rhetoric intended to freeze the division and prevent the inter-Korean relations from being mended.
					
					  What matters is that lurking behind his outbursts is an attempt at achieving "the unification of the social systems".
					
					 Ryu is fit for the post of minister of confrontation, not minister of unification. It is impossible to improve the inter-Korean relations as long as such traitor as Ryu is holding the post of minister of Unification.
					
					 The quislings opposed to national reunification will not be able to escape a stern judgment by history and the nation.

articles.title: Minju Joson Warns S. Korea Not to Forget Lesson from Yonphyong Island Shelling Case
articles.content:
Minju Joson Warns S. Korea Not to Forget Lesson from Yonphyong Island Shelling Case
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- It is three years since the Yonphyong Island shelling case occurred. On this occasion all Koreans hope such misfortune will not happen again. However, the south Korean puppet group is reacting to this public mindset with a frantic racket for a war against the DPRK.
					 Having loudly advertised the "3rd anniversary of  the Yonphyong island shelling" since early in November the south Korean warmongers held a "meeting to vow to  counter the provocation from the enemy" on Nov. 20 in order to agitate a war against the DPRK.
					
					 They staged war maneuvers all at once in the East, West and South Seas of Korea under the pretext of "countering provocations." They made no scruple of opening to public how massively they have reinforced their troops and war hardware on five islands in the West Sea of Korea including Yonphyong Island.
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday comments in this regard:
					
					 This is a deliberate criminal act to drive the situation on the Korean Peninsula into an extreme phase.
					
					 It is the ulterior motive of the warmongers to mislead public opinion by creating impression that the Yonphyong Island shelling took place due to the DPRK's "provocations" in a bid to justify and step up the moves for a war against the DPRK.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that the present ruling quarters in south Korea are putting spurs to the war moves against the DPRK kicked off by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					
					 The present ruling quarters are worse than the Lee group in belligerence.
					
					 In a word, the Park Geun Hye regime is poised to stand in confrontation with the DPRK to the last. This will only precipitate its self-destruction.
					
					 If the puppet group persists in its moves for a war against the DPRK, recklessly straining the situation as now, far from drawing a lesson from the Yonphyong Island shelling, the army and people of the DPRK will shower dozen-fold deadlier blows upon it.
					
					 The puppet group of south Korea would be well advised to stop its reckless acts, bearing this in mind.

articles.title: S. Korea Stage Drill under Simulated Conditions of Yonphyong Island Shelling
articles.content:
S. Korea Stage Drill under Simulated Conditions of Yonphyong Island Shelling
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet military warmongers Friday staged a military drill under the simulated conditions of Yonphyong Island shelling three years ago. 
					 The drill aimed at attack on the DPRK was staged on the ground and in waters and air as a coordinated operation of the Joint Chiefs of Staff, the 3rd Army Corps Command, the Navy Operation Command, the Air Force Operation Command and the Command for the Defense of Northwestern Islands. 
					
					 Meanwhile, units belonging to every operation command also waged drills for strike at the north as required by their operational duties and characters. 
					
					 During the military drill the Command for the Defense of Northwestern Islands showed a video on firing of missiles introduced by it from abroad for mounting a precision strike on areas of the north side. 
					
					 In the meantime, the warmongers hurled residents on Yonphyong Island into an evacuation drill, kicking up war atmosphere. 
					
					 Hundreds of students and residents, frightened by an alarm signal, were thrown into confusion while rushing to shelters. The whole island was ridden with a horrible atmosphere. The warmongers fired artillery pieces in different parts of the island, creating a war atmosphere. 
					
					 They ran amuck in the war drill to recover the heavy defeat they suffered while preempting shelling at the inviolable territorial waters of the north. During the Yonphyong Island shelling the enemy was hit hard by KPA artillerymen's deadly counter blows. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group's ambition for confrontation aiming at militarily stifling the DPRK and war moves are becoming evermore desperate.

articles.title: US, S. Korean Regime's Moves for Capitalist Ideological Poisoning against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
US, S. Korean Regime's Moves for Capitalist Ideological Poisoning against DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Nov. 15 carried an article contributed by the director of the Institute of Independent Ideology in Americas.
					  The imperialist allied forces and the south Korean conservative forces are making desperate efforts to introduce capitalist ideology and culture into the north where Songun politics is in force, the article said, and went on:
					
					 This is aimed at destabilizing the north ideologically and culturally and bringing it down as its leader, the party, the masses and the army have achieved the single-minded unity and it has strong military capability thanks to the Songun politics.
					
					 Several countries of the world including socialist countries in Eastern Europe collapsed mainly because they failed to wage a positive struggle against the imperialists' capitalist ideological and cultural poisoning, neglecting it.
					
					 If one is not armed with an independent idea, one is bound to be imbued with various evil ideas and corrupt capitalist idea. South Korea is little short of a state of the U.S. as the capitalist idea based on money-almighty thought is so rampant there that it is utterly indifferent to the national tradition, culture and mother tongue. 
					
					 It is necessary to regard ideology as a main thing and give priority to the ideological work.
					
					 It is for the people that the north is equipping them with an independent idea.
					
					 The ideological and cultural life the people in the north are leading and their noble ideological and moral traits clearly prove the advantages and might of the socialist system of Juche, the Juche idea and the ideological education in the north.
					
					 In the north all people are single-mindedly united around the leader, whole society has formed a large harmonious family and they are working and living full of faith and optimism, helping and leading each other along like brothers and sisters even under difficult and complicated circumstances.
					
					 This is the real picture of society in the north where the people are united on the basis of the Juche idea, the monolithic idea, thanks to the intensified ideological work under the guidance of the leader and the party.

articles.title: DPRK-Japan Seminar on Education Held in Osaka
articles.content:
DPRK-Japan Seminar on Education Held in Osaka
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The 15th DPRK-Japan seminar on education was held at Gita Osaka Korean primary and senior school in Osaka, Japan on Nov. 10.
					 It was cosponsored by the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, the Japan Teachers Union and the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange. Attending it were officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and those concerned of Korean schools and those concerned of educational institutions in Japan.
					
					 The chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Teachers in Japan, the director of the International Affairs Department of the Japan Teachers Union and the chairman of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange made speeches at the seminar.
					
					 It is important to lift voices against suppression and discrimination against national education in Osaka where national discrimination is getting serious, they said.
					
					 They urged the Japanese government to immediately apply the tuition-free program for senior high schools to Korean schools and pay subsidies to them.
					
					 Then followed a keynote report and speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers expressed concern over the undisguised national discrimination by the state power, declaring they would conduct a widespread campaign to settle the issue of aiding Korean schools.
					
					 An appeal was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 It called for carrying on the court struggle and signature campaign across Japan, demanding the Japanese government and the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan immediately apply the tuition-free program for senior high schools to Korean schools.

articles.title: Struggle for Independent, Peaceful Reunification of Korea Called for
articles.content:
Struggle for Independent, Peaceful Reunification of Korea Called for
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Overseas Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement on Nov. 20 to mark its 23rd anniversary.
					 The formation of Pomminryon made it possible for the Korean nation to have an organization for solidarity among compatriots in the north and the south and abroad to achieve the great unity of the nation which provides a sure guarantee for national reunification and for the movement for national reunification to briskly develop on a nationwide scale, the statement said.
					
					 Pomminryon set the idea of "By our nation itself" as an idea of all Koreans and has carried on the activities to lead all of them in the north and the south and abroad to work hard for achieving independent reunification under the banner of attaching importance to the nation, defending peace and achieving unity, it noted.
					
					 The prevailing grave situation once again reminds all Koreans of the lesson of history that the great national unity can be achieved only through a valiant struggle against the group of traitors in league with foreign forces, it said.
					
					 Pomminryon will always take the lead in the sacred struggle to bring earlier the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the uplifted banner of "By our nation itself," it declared.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Campaign Lambasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Campaign Lambasted
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia released a statement on Nov. 18 denouncing the south Korean authorities' moves against the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that the south Korean puppet authorities are alluring and abducting inhabitants of the DPRK and letting such human scum as those defectors from the north to kick up a malignant smear campaign against the DPRK.
					
					 We cannot but be stunned by the behaviors of the south Korean chief executive and prime minister praising to the sky human scum who ran away to the south after betraying their parents, wives and children and the grateful system that gave birth to, brought up and cured them and provided them with opportunities of learning, and hurling them into the anti-DPRK smear campaign, it noted, and went on:
					
					 The world knows no such depraved guys who are alluring and abducing inhabitants and using them as a shock brigade for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen by squandering money with all ministries and agencies of the regime involved as the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 Such smear campaign suffices to know well what the "confidence" touted by the south Korean chief executive is like, what extent her confrontation  hysteria has reached and how wretched her plight is as  she has no alternative but to use even human scum.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities stop at once such smear campaign by the use of defectors from the north, clearly mindful that their anti-DPRK conspiratorial plots will add to their crimes against the nation and history and precipitate their own doom.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Published in Mexico
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "For a Free and Peaceful New World" was brought out in booklet by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on November 15.
					 The work published on April 29, Juche 80 (1991) indicates the tasks for destroying the outdated international order and building instead a free and peaceful new world and ways to do so.

articles.title: Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated by Kuwaiti Figure
articles.content:
Anniversary of Demise of Kim Jong Il Commemorated by Kuwaiti Figure
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- Yousef Al Amiri, chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association who is president of the Kuwait House of Works, issued a statement on November 17 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 He said that Generalissimo Kim Jong Il's demise was a great loss not only to the Korean people but to the progressive humankind.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK could emerge a powerful fortress of independence against imperialism and play a pioneer's role in the struggle for defending the world peace and security thanks to the Songun politics pursued by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK has grown stronger as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un, peerlessly brilliant Songun commander.
					
					 Kim Jong Un is steering the struggle for building a thriving nation, creditably carrying forward the idea and cause of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The DPRK is a country of single-minded unity.
					
					 The history of single-minded unity provided by the Generalissimos is being successfully carried forward by Kim Jong Un.
					
					 We are sure that the DPRK's single-minded unity will result in working the world-startling great miracles.
					
					 We pay high tribute to Kim Jong Il and pray for his eternal life.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Indonesia
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was inaugurated with due ceremony at the building of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia (PPI) on November 18.
					 Eko Suryo Sanjojo, general chairman of the National Guidance Council of the PPI, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from November 18 to December 20 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events to introduce Kim Jong Il's undying feats.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Romania
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- A Romanian national committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Bucharest on November 11.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the remembrance period from November 25 to December 17 and decided to organize different political and cultural events to introduce Kim Jong Il's immortal exploits.

articles.title: DPRK's Building of Highly Civilized Nation Introduced by Uruguayan Paper
articles.content:
DPRK's Building of Highly Civilized Nation Introduced by Uruguayan Paper
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud carried an article titled "Highly civilized socialist nation" on November 14.
					 The paper said:
					
					 A dynamic drive is now under way in the DPRK to attain the goal of building a highly civilized socialist nation.
					
					 The universal compulsory 12-year education is in force and the universal free health care is also developing at a higher level.
					
					 The Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, the Okryu Children's Hospital and other modern health care institutions have appeared to further round off the specialized medical service. A lot of sanitaria are being renovated across the country.
					
					 A hot wind of sports sweeping the country is resulting in spectacular successes in international games. 
					
					 There appeared Changjon Street in the heart of Pyongyang. Lots of modern dwelling houses are springing up in other cities and rural areas. The People's Theater, the Rungna People's Pleasure Park, Ryugyong Health Complex and other facilities for cultural and emotional life of people have been built to meet the daily growing demands of people.
					
					 The whole country has turned into a thick woodland and greenery, converting its urban and rural areas into a socialist fairyland.
					
					 In a word, the DPRK has a good prospect for enabling its people to enjoy a highly civilized life.
					
					 The paper carried photos showing extramural activities of schoolchildren in the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Koreas' Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Flayed by British Organizations
articles.content:
S. Koreas' Anti-DPRK Smear Campaign Flayed by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, November 23 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on November 9 denouncing the south Korean authorities for their anti-DPRK smear campaign.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The south Korean regime has conducted operations to lure and abduct inhabitants of the DPRK through such plot-breeding organizations as "Turihana".
					
					 This clearly indicates that the puppet forces are making all desperate efforts to bring down socialist Korea of Juche.
					
					 It is just for the DPRK to punish the south Korean Intelligence Service and its boss Nam Jae Jun and others concerned.
					
					 Progressive organizations, peace-loving forces and human rights organizations in the UK should turn a deaf ear to the false propaganda made by the puppet IS and reactionaries to defame the DPRK and its Juche-oriented socialist system.

articles.title: MINREX rechaza sofisma de fuerzas hostiles sobre crimen de drogas
articles.content:
MINREX rechaza sofisma de fuerzas hostiles sobre crimen de drogas
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que en estos dias las fuerzas hostiles tratan de vincular injustamente la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con el crimen internacional de drogas, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 22 a la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea la siguiente respuesta:
					En estos dias, los medios de prensa venales del Occidente difunden el rumor erroneo de que la RPDC es la fuente principal del crimen internacional de drogas. Esta sofisteria proviene de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					La RPDC rechaza totalmente tal intriga calificandola de un vil complot politico inventado por las fuerzas hostiles que se entregan a la propaganda enganosa para aislar y aplastar a la RPDC.
					
					En esta estan prohibidas legalmente la elaboracion y la venta ilicitas de drogas y son intolerables tales fenomenos en el sistema social.
					
					Hoy en dia, todo el mundo sabe que en EE.UU. se gasta mayor cantidad de drogas y ocurren mayores crimenes de drogas y que en los paises donde se echan las garras de agresion del imperio yanqui estan en boga la elaboracion y venta ilicitas de drogas.
					
					EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites, que crean tales crimenes internacionales, deben limpiar, primero, sus narices.

articles.title: Portavoz de CEC apoya lucha de jovenes estudiantes de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de CEC apoya lucha de jovenes estudiantes de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En su declaracion fechada 23, el portavoz del Comite de Estudiantes de Corea envio apoyo y  respaldo a la justa lucha de los jovenes estudiantes y otros habitantes del Sur de Corea quienes se han levantado en la lucha por la democracia de la sociedad frente a la represion fascista anti-popular y la mala administracion de la banda titere.
					Hoy en dia, el Sur de Corea se ha convertido en una tundra, infierno de la democracia del siglo XXI en que son violados flagrantemente los elementales derechos humanos y la democracia y hasta la libertad de la idea y las actividades politicas, subraya la nota y continua:
					
					Los restantes de la dictadura de "Yusin" sentenciada severamente hace mas 30 anos por  la nacion y sus descendientes se ponen mas freneticos como si encontraran la oportunidad. Insatisfechos de la infame "Ley de Seguridad" ellos inventan hasta la "ley de disolucion de la entidad pro-enemiga" creando asi en toda la sociedad un extremado ambiente terrorifico.
					
					Atemorizadas por haberse revelado la vil naturaleza de las fuerzas conservadoras en actual poder, que lo tomaron valiendose de  todos los enganos y mentiras, intentan desviar la opinion publica y eliminar todas las fuerzas progresistas y democraticas, que son considerados como obstaculos en su gobernacion anti-popular y en la toma perenne del poder.
					
					Si en el Sur de Corea resucita la dictadura de "Yusin", no se podra esperar mas el valioso sueno y la esperanza de los jovenes y estudiantes sobre el futuro.
					
					La historia demuestra que los jovenes y los estudiantes del Sur de Corea cumplieron siempre el papal vanguardista para la justicia y la verdad de la sociedad.
					
					Todos los jovenes y estudiantes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea estaran siempre al lado de los valientes jovenes del Sur de Corea que se han levantado en la lucha contra el renacimiento de la dictadura de "Yusin" y la ofensiva represiva de la banda titere conservadora contra las fuerzas progresistas y democraticas y estan convencidos de que saldran victoriosos sin falta en la lucha por la democracia de la sociedad.

articles.title: "Doctrina de mantenimiento de principios" busca enfrentamiento y guerra, senala Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
"Doctrina de mantenimiento de principios" busca enfrentamiento y guerra, senala Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- La "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios" de los traidores surcoreanos es la teoria de guerra nuclear anti-Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y de enfrentamiento fratricida para llevar a la fase de explosion las relaciones intercoreanas.
					Insiste asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado este sabado y continua:
					
					Los "principios" aludidos por los titeres surcoreanos significan la "creacion de confianza entre ambas partes coreanas" a base del "disuasivo seguro" que quiere decir la "alianza" con Estados Unidos. 
					
					Es decir, ellos quieren construir la confianza con la parte connacional con la ayuda de las fuerzas extranjeras que no desean nunca la paz de la Peninsula Coreana ni el relajamiento de las tensas relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					Ellas tienen la siniestra intencion de sacar provechos de la agravacion de enfrentamiento fratricida entre ambas partes coreanas y de la inestabilidad regional. 
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres surcoreanos insisten en resolver las relaciones con la connacional Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a base de la "alianza" con EE.UU. Esto es una expresion de su intento criminal de enfrentarse hasta el final con la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que intentan provocar con EE.UU. la guerra nuclear contra la RPDC hablando del "principio de prohibir el uso de armas nucleares del Norte de Corea" y "hacer frente conjunto a la amenaza nuclear". 
					
					Los hechos arriba mencionados evidencian que la "doctrina de mantenimiento de principios" es la teoria de guerra y enfrentamiento que agrava la confrontacion fratricida y perturba la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparates conflictivos de Ryu Kil Jae
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia disparates conflictivos de Ryu Kil Jae
Pyongyang, 23 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En una conferencia especial efectuada hace unos dias, el ministro de Unificacion del Sur de Corea, Ryu Kil Jae, abogo por "formular la concepcion de unificacion conforme a la epoca" y agrego que en el caso necesario "no se debe pronunciar ni la palabra unificacion".
					 El periodico Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual difundido el dia 23, lo califica de disparates conflictivos de quien no siente verguenza como miembro de la nacion y prosigue:
					
					 La reunificacion deseada por la nacion coreana significa no realizarla con premisa de absorber uno a otro, sino poner fin a la dominacion y la intervencion de las fuerzas foraneas en el territorio patrio, establecer la soberania nacional y realizar la union nacional entre el Norte y el Sur como una nacion.
					
					 Es tragico que esta verdad clara para todos los coreanos no la sabe solo Ryu Kil Jae que se autodenomina como "especialista del tema del Norte".
					
					Ademas, el traidor dijo que no se sintiera avergonzado ante la tragedia de la division nacional, lo que no pasa de ser disparates astutos para perpetuar la division e impedir la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur.
					
					  Lo problematico es que en el fondo de sus disparates esta ocultado el intento de la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					 A Ryu Kil Jae no le conviene el ministro de Unificacion sino el de confrontacion.
					
					 Este maniaco del enfrentamiento ocupo el ministro de Unificacion, razon por la cual no se mejoran las relaciones N-S.
					
					 Los traidores opuestos a la reunificacion de la patria, no evitaran la severa sentencia de la historia y la nacion.
